EmailTemplate.description: This is the email template invitation to the VinSolutions Onsite Training Survey
EmailTemplate.name: On Site Training Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions would like to hear about your most recent on site training experience!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} of {!Contact.account_name__c},
VinSolutions is very interested in hearing from you about the recent training you participated in at your dealership. (If you did not attend training, please disregard this message.)
Please take a few moments to click on the Tell Vin link below and complete the attached survey. Your feedback is important to us - it allows us to continue what we do well and focus on the things that need improvement.
Tell Vin
Thanks again,
Your VinCare Team.
